languages.text: "Скорбная весть. Технобрат Авель был избран Омниссией для постижения великих тайн. Пусть Движущая сила его духа обретет себя вновь в купели Чудотворного Реактора Синтеза".

"Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."
languages.original_text: "Скорбная весть. Технобрат Авель был избран Омниссией для постижения великих тайн. Пусть Движущая сила его духа обретет себя вновь в купели Чудотворного Реактора Синтеза".

traits.locale_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the font of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

"Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the font of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

"Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

languages.text: "Eine traurige Nachricht. Tech-Bruder Abel wurde vom Omnissiah auserwählt, große Mysterien zu verstehen. Möge der Antriebskraft seines Geists im Quell des Wundersamen Fusionsreaktors neue Gestalt verliehen werden."
languages.original_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

traits.locale_text: "Eine traurige Nachricht. Tech-Bruder Abel wurde vom Omnissiah auserwählt, große Mysterien zu verstehen. Möge der Antriebskraft seines Geists im Quell des Wundersamen Fusionsreaktors neue Gestalt verliehen werden."

languages.text: « Voilà une bien triste nouvelle. Le technofrère Abel avait été choisi par l'Omnimessie pour comprendre de grands mystères... Puisse la Force Motrice de son esprit se renouveler dans la source du réacteur à fusion miraculeux. »
languages.original_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une bien triste nouvelle. Le technofrère Abel avait été choisi par l'Omnimessie pour comprendre de grands mystères... Puisse la Force Motrice de son esprit se renouveler dans la source du réacteur à fusion miraculeux. »

languages.text: “真是个令人悲伤的消息。技术兄弟亚伯曾被欧姆尼塞亚选中，成为伟大奥秘的理解者。愿他灵魂中的源力，能在神赐聚变反应堆的源泉中重获新生。”
languages.original_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

traits.locale_text: “真是个令人悲伤的消息。技术兄弟亚伯亚伯曾被欧姆尼塞亚选中，成为伟大奥秘的理解者。愿他灵魂中的原初动力，能在神赐聚变反应堆的源泉中重获新生。”

languages.text: 「実に悲しい知らせだ。技術同志アベルは、偉大なる神秘の理解者として万機神に選ばれた。彼の魂の原動力が、奇跡のフュージョンリアクターの泉で新たに生まれ変わらんことを」
languages.original_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

traits.locale_text: 「実に悲しい知らせだ。テックブラザー・アベルは、偉大なる神秘の理解者として万機神に選ばれた。彼の魂の原動力が、奇跡のフュージョンリアクターの泉で新たに生まれ変わらんことを」

languages.text: «Desde luego son malas noticias. El tecnohermano Abel fue elegido por el Omnissiah para descifrar grandes misterios. Que la Fuerza Motriz de su espíritu vuelva a nacer en la fuente del Reactor de Fusión Milagrosa».
languages.original_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego son malas noticias. El tecnohermano Abel fue elegido por el Omnissiah para descifrar grandes misterios. Que la Fuerza Motriz de su espíritu vuelva a nacer en la fuente del Reactor de Fusión Milagrosa».

languages.text: "Vahim bir haber. Tekno Kardeş Abel, Hermesih tarafından büyük gizem perdelerini aralaması için seçilmişti. Ruhunun Devinim Gücü, Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nün pınarında yeniden varlık bulsun."
languages.original_text: "Sad news indeed. Tech-Brother Abel was chosen by the Omnissiah to be a comprehender of great mysteries. May his spirit's Motive Force come into being anew in the fount of the Miraculous Fusion Reactor."

traits.locale_text: "Sahiden üzüntü verici bir haber. Tekno Kardeş Abel, Hermesih tarafından büyük gizemlerin algılayıcısı olarak seçilmişti. Ruhunun Devinim Gücü, Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nün pınarında yeniden varlık bulsun."
